citations.narrative:
There were five (5) Border Collies in a sheltered facility with shredded insulation above their primary enclosures. The
pieces of insulation can fall in the enclosures and potentially be ingested by the dogs. This could injure the animals by
making them sick if ingested. The insulation in the facilities must be in good repair to protect the animals from injury.
Correct by 1 November 2025

Noticeable rust was observed along the caging of the dens for two (2) white-throated capuchins. Rusty surfaces cannot
be effectively cleaned and sanitized. Any surfaces that come in contact with nonhuman primates must be free of
excessive rust that prevents the required cleaning and sanitization, or that affects the structural strength of the surface.
Correct by 1 November 2025

An enclosure with six (6) Painted Desert sheep had a 3-sided shelter that was knocked down by the animals. The shelter
has sheets of metal with sharp edges and broken wood on it that can be injurious to the animals housed in the enclosure.
The broken structure needs to be in good repair to protect the animals from injury.
Correct by 1 November 2025.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with licensee.
n

narrative:
3.1(a) 
   
Housing facilities, general. 
There were five (5) Border Collies in a sheltered facility with shredded insulation above their primary enclosures. The 
pieces of insulation can fall in the enclosures and potentially be ingested by the dogs. This could injure the animals by 
making them sick if ingested. The insulation in the facilities must be in good repair to protect the animals from injury.  
 
Correct by 1 November 2025 
3.75(c)(1)(i) 
   
Housing facilities, general. 
Noticeable rust was observed along the caging of the dens for two (2) white-throated capuchins. Rusty surfaces cannot 
be effectively cleaned and sanitized. Any surfaces that come in contact with nonhuman primates must be free of 
excessive rust that prevents the required cleaning and sanitization, or that affects the structural strength of the surface. 
 
Correct by 1 November 2025 
3.125(a) 
   
Facilities, general. 
An enclosure with six (6) Painted Desert sheep had a 3-sided shelter that was knocked down by the animals. The shelter 
has sheets of metal with sharp edges and broken wood on it that can be injurious to the animals housed in the enclosure. 
The broken structure needs to be in good repair to protect the animals from injury. 
 
Correct by 1 November 2025. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with licensee.
